Text: so, this is the left side of an SBS 3D source print..?

Open matte means no black bars at the top and bottom of the picture. Unlike the previous versions which had the 2.35:1 aspect ratio, this is 1.78:1 and no this isn't stretched or cropped. It just includes more of the movie.
Any chance of getting a 1080p of the open matte? Would be eternally grateful!
